workshoptitle: Installing Oracle Database 21c on OCI Compute

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: This lab introduces the workshop on Oracle Database Administration Essentials.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Prepare Setup
tutorials.description: How to download your ORM stack and update security rules for an existing VCN.

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Environment Setup
tutorials.description: How to provision the workshop environment and connect to it

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Install Oracle Database (Desktop Class)
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through the steps for installing Oracle Database 21c with minimal configuration

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Install Oracle Database (Server Class)
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through the steps for installing Oracle Database 21c with detailed configuration.

tutorials.title: Lab 6: Create Container Database (Typical Mode)
tutorials.description: This lab shows how to create a container database with typical configuration. It does not install the Oracle Database software.

tutorials.title: Lab 7: Create Container Database (Advanced Mode)
tutorials.description: This lab shows how to create a single instance container database with advanced configuration. It does not install the Oracle Database software.

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
